public class ThreadedClient
extends java.lang.Thread

Title: ThreadedClient.java

Description: Threaded class that will send messages to the other agents.

Version:
2.3
Author:
Ola Laleye, Mike McNamara, Anthony Pitluga

ThreadedClient

public ThreadedClient(Message m,
                      java.lang.String ip,
                      int port,
                      int count)
Constructor - Will create a socket on the designated ip and port and send that message over that socket, the socket will then be closed
Parameters:
m - message
ip - ip address
port - port number
count - number of attempts to send message

ThreadedClient

public ThreadedClient(Message m,
                      java.net.Socket s)
Constructor - sets the message to send and will broadcast this message to all the clients who's sockets are passed. Will spawn a new thread to handle each client. When the user passes the socket, they are responsible for closing that socket.
Parameters:
m - message to send
s - sockets to send to
Method Detail

run

public void run()
Will run the thread. This will send the message to the desired client
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread
